CustomField.description: If selected, Revenue Forecasting excludes from % Complete forecasts any actuals that are after the specified cutoff day. This setting is used in conjunction with the Use Mid Month Forecast Calculations and Actuals Cutoff Day settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, Revenue Forecasting excludes from % Complete forecasts any actuals that are after the specified cutoff day. This setting is used in conjunction with the Use Mid Month Forecast Calculations and Actuals Cutoff Day settings.
CustomField.label: Exclude Actuals After Cutoff Day
